text: Khaddzh sovershayetsya v opredelennyye mesyatsy. Tot, kto v eti mesyatsy reshil sovershit' khaddzh, ne dolzhen v etot period vstupat' v snosheniya [s zhenshchinoy], dopuskat' grekhovnfe postupki i zatevat' ssory. A o tom, chto vy sdelayete dobrogo, Allakhu vedomo. Zapasaytes' zhe na dorogu, ibo luchshiy pripas - eto blagochestiye. Boytes' zhe Menya, o obladayushchiye razumom
